title: Good work RIOT
body: Hay RIOT, i'm not here to make an argument, or say the next thing yous have stuffed up, but instead, i just wanted to congratulate yous guys, yous really but a lot of work into this game, i love all the new splash arts, and all the time yous spend for our entertainment, also all the creativity yous put into the champions, iv played this game for a while now (not that long compared to other people but still :P) and there is always something new to keep us entertained every now and then, so thanks yous :D

replies.body: {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} Loving all of these positive posts!
Please don't say yous. God that's irritating

And how long have you been playing League for? I have been here now 4-5 years, I for one hate this patch, there is too much of a change from what I got used to from all those years of playing.

Last game I was hitting 600+ damage with Malz into the towers at end game, I even got Nashor's Tooth to make me hit faster to towers, hacking into the Nexus at 638 damage with a hit time of ~1.1 per second, at 5500 Nexus health that takes only 8.62 hits or ~8 seconds for one AP to kill the Nexus, alone.
